text: Eric Stanley is the first and only extended play (EP) released by American violinist Eric Stanley. The EP was officially released on 10 July 2015, three months after Stanley's national debut on ESPN First Take. The EP included 4 tracks (Voltaire, Another Year, Stay Inspired and Amazing Grace).https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/eric-stanley- ep/id1005214324https://rateyourmusic.com/release/ep/eric_stanley_f1/eric_stanley_ep/ ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2015 debut EPs Category:Instrumental EPs
title: Eric Stanley (EP)
